title: Editor's Choice Pictures
text:
Pictures | Wed Apr 18, 2018 | 8:16am EDT Editor's Choice Pictures 
A Central American migrant, moving in a caravan through Mexico, holds a bag as she and fellow migrants cross a railway line to stop a freight train and get on it, in Irapuato, in Guanajuato   Tuesday, April 17, 2018 A Central American migrant, moving in a caravan through Mexico, holds a bag as she and fellow migrants cross a railway line to stop a freight train and get on it, in Irapuato, in Guanajuato   1 / 24 
Emergency personnel monitor the damaged engine of Southwest Airlines Flight 1380, which diverted to the Philadelphia International Airport this morning after the airline crew reported damage to one of the aircraft's engines, on a runway in... more Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 Emergency personnel monitor the damaged engine of Southwest Airlines Flight 1380, which diverted to the Philadelphia International Airport this morning after the airline crew reported damage to one of the aircraft's engines, on a runway in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. REUTERS/Mark Makela Close 2 / 24 
Former FBI Director James Comey arrives for a taping of "The Late Show with Stephen Colbert" in the Manhattan borough of New York City, New York. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 Former FBI Director James Comey arrives for a taping of "The Late Show with Stephen Colbert" in the Manhattan borough of New York City, New York. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid Close 3 / 24 
President Donald Trump hosts a bilateral meeting with Japan�s Prime Minister Shinzo Abe at Trump�s Mar-a-Lago estate in Palm Beach, Florida. REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 President Donald Trump hosts a bilateral meeting with Japan�s Prime Minister Shinzo Abe at Trump�s Mar-a-Lago estate in Palm Beach, Florida. REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque Close 4 / 24 
A grove of trees destroyed by the Rhea Fire is seen near Taloga, Oklahoma, April 17, 2018. REUTERS/Nick Oxford Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 A grove of trees destroyed by the Rhea Fire is seen near Taloga, Oklahoma, April 17, 2018. REUTERS/Nick Oxford Close 5 / 24 
Ballet dancer Sandro Calderon, 30, connects to the internet with his mobile at a hotspot in the seafront in Havana, Cuba. REUTERS/Alexandre Meneghini Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 Ballet dancer Sandro Calderon, 30, connects to the internet with his mobile at a hotspot in the seafront in Havana, Cuba. REUTERS/Alexandre Meneghini Close 6 / 24 
A sandstorm approaches in Yazd, Iran April 16, 2018 in this image obtained from social media. Matthias Schmidt via REUTERS Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 A sandstorm approaches in Yazd, Iran April 16, 2018 in this image obtained from social media. Matthias Schmidt via REUTERS Close 7 / 24 
The hideout used by the three men who stand accused of carrying out the assassination of anti-  Galizia, is seen in Marsa, in Valletta's Grand Harbour,   Tuesday, April 17, 2018 The hideout used by the three men who stand accused of carrying out the assassination of anti-  Galizia, is seen in Marsa, in Valletta's Grand Harbour,   8 / 24 
Iraqi Yazidis light candles and paraffin torches during a ceremony to celebrate the Yazidi New Year at Lalish temple in Shikhan in Dohuk province, Iraq. REUTERS/Ari Jalal Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 Iraqi Yazidis light candles and paraffin torches during a ceremony to celebrate the Yazidi New Year at Lalish temple in Shikhan in Dohuk province, Iraq. REUTERS/Ari Jalal Close 9 / 24 
Farmer Javier Tamayo, 55, poses for a photograph with his grandson outside his home in the village of Santo Domingo, in the Sierra Maestra, Cuba. REUTERS/Alexandre Meneghini Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 Farmer Javier Tamayo, 55, poses for a photograph with his grandson outside his home in the village of Santo Domingo, in the Sierra Maestra, Cuba. REUTERS/Alexandre Meneghini Close 10 / 24 
The Rhea fire burns through a grove of red cedar trees near Seiling, Oklahoma. REUTERS/Nick Oxford Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 The Rhea fire burns through a grove of red cedar trees near Seiling, Oklahoma. REUTERS/Nick Oxford Close 11 / 24 
Children of Iraqi Kawliya group (known as Iraqi gypsies) attend a class at a school in al-Zuhoor village near the southern city of Diwaniya, Iraq. REUTERS/Alaa Al-Marjani Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 Children of Iraqi Kawliya group (known as Iraqi gypsies) attend a class at a school in al-Zuhoor village near the southern city of Diwaniya, Iraq. REUTERS/Alaa Al-Marjani Close 12 / 24 
Israeli soldiers sit next to a monument engraved with names of fallen Israeli soldiers, ahead of a ceremony marking Memorial Day in Jerusalem. REUTERS/Ronen Zvulun Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 Israeli soldiers sit next to a monument engraved with names of fallen Israeli soldiers, ahead of a ceremony marking Memorial Day in Jerusalem. REUTERS/Ronen Zvulun Close 13 / 24 
A boy kicks a ball during a practise session of a seminar organized by the football club Shakhtar Donetsk, for soccer training for children with disabilities, near Kiev, Ukraine. REUTERS/Gleb Garanich Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 A boy kicks a ball during a practise session of a seminar organized by the football club Shakhtar Donetsk, for soccer training for children with disabilities, near Kiev, Ukraine. REUTERS/Gleb Garanich Close 14 / 24 
Jazmin, 9, carries a cardboard car to be used in a play in her school at Anapra neighbourhood in Ciudad Juarez, Mexico. REUTERS/Jose Luis Gonzalez Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 Jazmin, 9, carries a cardboard car to be used in a play in her school at Anapra neighbourhood in Ciudad Juarez, Mexico. REUTERS/Jose Luis Gonzalez Close 15 / 24 
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, his wife Ri Sol Ju and Song Tao, head of the International Department of Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee, applaud with ballet dancers in this undated photo released by North Korea's Korean Central... more Reuters / Monday, April 16, 2018 North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, his wife Ri Sol Ju and Song Tao, head of the International Department of Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee, applaud with ballet dancers in this undated   (KCNA) in Pyongyang. KCNA/via Reuters Close 16 / 24 
Pierre-Hugues Herbert of France in action during his second round match against Bulgaria's Grigor Dimitrov during the Monte Carlo Masters. REUTERS/Eric Gaillard Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 Pierre-Hugues Herbert of France in action during his second round match against Bulgaria's Grigor Dimitrov during the Monte Carlo Masters. REUTERS/Eric Gaillard Close 17 / 24 
A woman shouts slogans during a protest against the rape of an eight-year-old girl in Kathua, near Jammu, in Srinagar. REUTERS/Danish Ismail Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 A woman shouts slogans during a protest against the rape of an eight-year-old girl in Kathua, near Jammu, in Srinagar. REUTERS/Danish Ismail Close 18 / 24 
President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump dine with Japan's Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and Abe's wife Akie at Trump's Mar-a-Lago estate in Palm Beach, Florida. REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump dine with Japan's Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and Abe's wife Akie at Trump's Mar-a-Lago estate in Palm Beach, Florida. REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque Close 19 / 24 
French President Emmanuel Macron reacts during the opening of a series of citizen's consultation meetings on Europe in Epinal, France. Frederick Florin/Pool via Reuters Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 French President Emmanuel Macron reacts during the opening of a series of citizen's consultation meetings on Europe in Epinal, France. Frederick Florin/Pool via Reuters Close 20 / 24 
Israeli scouts attend a ceremony marking Memorial Day at the Mount Herzl military cemetery in Jerusalem. REUTERS/Ammar Awad Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 Israeli scouts attend a ceremony marking Memorial Day at the Mount Herzl military cemetery in Jerusalem. REUTERS/Ammar Awad Close 
Pigeons are seen perched on windows in the old city of Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/Ali Hashisho Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 Pigeons are seen perched on windows in the old city of Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/Ali Hashisho Close 22 / 24 
People visit an airborne labyrinth of polycarbonate installation called "Limbo", created by Jacopo Foggini, during Design Week in Milan, Italy. REUTERS/Daniele Mascolo Reuters / Tuesday, April 17, 2018 People visit an airborne labyrinth of polycarbonate installation called "Limbo", created by Jacopo Foggini, during Design Week in Milan, Italy. REUTERS/Daniele Mascolo Close 23 / 24 
An aerial view shows erosion marks on sand and stone, on the beach along the Atlantic Ocean coast, in Soulac, France. REUTERS/Regis Duvignau Reuters / Wednesday, April 18, 2018 An aerial view shows erosion marks on sand and stone, on the beach along the Atlantic Ocean coast, in Soulac, France. REUTERS/Regis Duvignau Close
